languages.text:
"Молчание дороже сотни слов,
Но здесь в цене иные самоцветы.
Рубины крови, изумруды мук,
Ты раздобудешь в вальсе средь теней".

traits.locale_text:
"Молчание дороже сотни слов,
Но здесь в цене иные самоцветы.
Рубины крови, изумруды мук,
Ты раздобудешь в вальсе средь теней".
traits.speaker: ZanniIncognito

languages.text:
"Your wordlessness is worth a hundred words,
But here you ply your trade in other gems:
Red rubies of blood, and emeralds of pain,
The dance will leave your pockets fit to burst."
languages.original_text:
"Молчание дороже сотни слов,
Но здесь в цене иные самоцветы.
Рубины крови, изумруды мук,
Ты раздобудешь в вальсе средь теней".

"Your wordlessness is worth a hundred words,
But here you ply your trade in other gems:
Red rubies of blood, and emeralds of pain,
The dance will leave your pockets fit to burst."
traits.speaker: ZanniIncognito

traits.locale_text:
"Your wordlessness is worth a hundred words,
But here you ply your trade in other gems:
Red rubies of blood, and emeralds of pain,
The dance will leave your pockets fit to burst."
traits.speaker: ZanniIncognito

languages.text:
“你的沉默胜过千言万语，
但还有宝石在等待着你。
鲜血的红宝石，痛苦的祖母绿，
跳舞吧，让宝石满足你的贪欲。”
languages.original_text:
"Your wordlessness is worth a hundred words,
But here you ply your trade in other gems:
Red rubies of blood, and emeralds of pain,
The dance will leave your pockets fit to burst."

traits.locale_text:
“你的沉默胜过千言万语，
但还有宝石在等待着你。
鲜血的红宝石，痛苦的祖母绿，
跳舞吧，让宝石满足你的贪欲。”
traits.speaker: ZanniIncognito

languages.text:
「無は千の言葉を語る
君はさまざまな宝石を商う。
真っ赤な血のルビー、痛みのエメラルド
踊ればポケットが満ちて溢れるだろう」
languages.original_text:
"Your wordlessness is worth a hundred words,
But here you ply your trade in other gems:
Red rubies of blood, and emeralds of pain,
The dance will leave your pockets fit to burst."

traits.locale_text:
「無は千の言葉を語る
君はさまざまな宝石を商う。
真っ赤な血のルビー、痛みのエメラルド
踊ればポケットが満ちて溢れるだろう」
traits.speaker: ZanniIncognito

languages.text:
«Tu silencio vale más que cien palabras,
pero tendrás que comerciar con otras gemas:
con rubíes de sangre y de dolor esmeraldas,
este baile llenará tus bolsillos de riquezas».
languages.original_text:
"Your wordlessness is worth a hundred words,
But here you ply your trade in other gems:
Red rubies of blood, and emeralds of pain,
The dance will leave your pockets fit to burst."

traits.locale_text:
«Tu silencio vale más que cien palabras,
pero tendrás que comerciar con otras gemas:
con rubíes de sangre y de dolor esmeraldas,
este baile llenará tus bolsillos de riquezas».
traits.speaker: ZanniIncognito

languages.text:
« Votre silence vaut tous les mots du monde,
Mais pas autant que ces gemmes qui abondent :
Rubis de sang et émeraudes de souffrance
Feront votre fortune au fil de la danse. »
languages.original_text:
"Your wordlessness is worth a hundred words,
But here you ply your trade in other gems:
Red rubies of blood, and emeralds of pain,
The dance will leave your pockets fit to burst."

traits.locale_text:
« Votre silence vaut tous les mots du monde,
Mais pas autant que ces gemmes qui abondent :
Rubis de sang et émeraudes de souffrance
Feront votre fortune au fil de la danse. »
traits.speaker: ZanniIncognito

languages.text:
"Eure Wortlosigkeit ist hundert Worte wert,
aber hier wird in anderen Juwelen gehandelt:
roten Rubinen aus Blut und Smaragden aus Schmerz,
ein Tanz, der Eure Taschen zum Bersten voll macht."
languages.original_text:
"Your wordlessness is worth a hundred words,
But here you ply your trade in other gems:
Red rubies of blood, and emeralds of pain,
The dance will leave your pockets fit to burst."

traits.locale_text:
"Eure Wortlosigkeit ist hundert Worte wert,
aber hier wird in anderen Juwelen gehandelt:
roten Rubinen aus Blut und Smaragden aus Schmerz,
ein Tanz, der Eure Taschen zum Bersten voll macht."
traits.speaker: ZanniIncognito

languages.text:
"Sözcüksüzlüğün yüz sözcük değerinde,
Buradaki ticaret ama başka cevherler üzerine:
Kızıl kan yakutları ve acı zümrütleri,
Tıka basa dolduracak bu dans ceplerini."
languages.original_text:
"Your wordlessness is worth a hundred words,
But here you ply your trade in other gems:
Red rubies of blood, and emeralds of pain,
The dance will leave your pockets fit to burst."
